00077   inline
00078   libport::ThreadPool::rTaskLock
00079   UObject::getTaskLock(LockMode m, const std::string& what)
00080   {
00081     typedef libport::ThreadPool::rTaskLock rTaskLock;
00082     typedef libport::ThreadPool::TaskLock TaskLock;
00083     // Static in inlined functions are per-module.
00084     static rTaskLock module_lock(new TaskLock);
00085     switch(m)
00086     {
00087     case LOCK_NONE:
00088       return 0;
00089       break;
00090     case LOCK_FUNCTION:
00091       {
00092         rTaskLock& res = taskLocks_[what];
00093         if (!res)
00094           res = new TaskLock;
00095         return res;
00096       }
00097       break;
00098     case LOCK_INSTANCE:
00099       return taskLock_;
00100       break;
00101     case LOCK_CLASS:
00102       return getClassTaskLock();
00103       break;
00104     case LOCK_MODULE:
00105       return module_lock;
00106       break;
00107     }
00108     return 0;
00109   }

00112 #ifndef NO_UOBJECT_CASTER
00113   inline UObject*
00114   uvalue_caster<UObject*>::operator()(UValue& v)
00115   {
00116     if (v.type != DATA_STRING && v.type != DATA_SLOTNAME)
00117       return 0;
00118     return getUObject(*v.stringValue);
00119   }
00120   inline
00121   UValue& operator,(UValue&a, const UObject* b)
00122   {
00123     if (!b)
00124       a = "nil";
00125     else
00126       a = b->__name;
00127     a.type = DATA_SLOTNAME;
00128     return a;
00129   }
00130 
00131 #ifndef NO_ANY_POINTER_CASTER
00132   template<typename T> struct
00133   uvalue_caster<T*> {
00134     T* operator()(UValue& v)
00135     {
00136       UObject* res = uvalue_caster<UObject*>()(v);
00137       return dynamic_cast<T*>(res);
00138     }
00139   };
00140 #endif
00141 #endif
